name: Susmit Kulkarni
title: AI/ML Engineer & Backend Developer
about: Enthusiastic AI/ML engineer with a deep interest in privacy advocacy and a proven track record in problem-solving. I possess a solid grasp of Data Structures and Algorithms, coupled with hands-on experience in deploying AI models.

My expertise lies in developing machine learning models, natural language processing systems, and scalable backend services. I'm constantly exploring new technologies and methodologies to stay at the forefront of AI and backend development.
Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering with a specialization in AI, I'm excited to apply my skills and knowledge to contribute meaningfully to innovative projects.
